item.title: The Big Test
item.description: During the cold war, US needed manpower for army, but also wanted to some men to go to college to become professionals.

item.title: All Joy And No Fun - Reading Notes
item.description: Three development that has complicated parenting: Freedom of choice: People used to have kids because it was customary, economically necessary, or it was a moral obligation.

item.title: Reading: Whatever It Takes
item.description: Parent from poor socioeconomic backgrounds are disadvantaged: they may not understand the effect of their action on their children’s cognitive development they may not have the cognitive bandwidth to effect change they may model their actions after unhealthy examples their parenting approach may be built upon false assumptions Harmlen Children Zone is an-encompassing programs for poverty-striken children in Harlem.

item.title: School Architecture Deep Dive
item.description: Pre-civil war: Concept of schooling is tied strongly to the school house Conversion from one-room school house to larger education institution
